noun.description: A phallicist. Also (now especially): a male chauvinist or supremacist.

adjective.description: Of or relating to a phallist or phallists; characterized by phallicism or phallocentricity.

origin: Late 19th century; earliest use found in Isaac Funk (1839–1912), publisher and reformer. From phallus + -ist, after phallism.
